tool_description: An Api showing all idx news from idx.co.id
name: idx news
title: idx news

api_list.name: Get IDX news by page
api_list.description: This endpoint will return idx news by page number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://idx-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idx-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://idx-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idx-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
